projectReviews.ProjectTitle: DSMC simulation of Rayleigh Benard flows in a Rarefied regime
review: Basically meant to simulate a continuum phenomena in a Rarefied regime (found in microscale flows and very high altitudes/near space). We use OpenFOAM (specifically dsmcfoam) to simulate this

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Two way Fluid Structure Interaction (FSI) in flexible structures with low mass ratios
review: Usually intended to simulate FSI between submerged structures in oceans like mooring lines and oil boring pipes. Involves writing a specialised C code (also called an user defined function) which can only be compiled in ansys fluent.

Really nice prof , has alot of knowledge in this domain. Though it would've been better if I could do this offline. Replies promptly and answers all my questions. The work is very interesting too . No complaints, would definitely recommend if you're interested in his work.

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Redesigning Automotive Interiors with an emphasis on Sustainability
review: This project is particularly relevant for the Indian automotive scenario, with a special focus on sub-4m vehicles. There is a massive research gap with respect to sustainability approaches to design in the Indian automotive industry, this study hopes to shorten that gap.

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Elliptic Curves and Elliptic Curve Cryptography
review: Wonderful experience with lot of freedom and no pressure whatsoever ^_^

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Remote Sensing and socio economic indicators
review: There are a lot of things to learn but the time constraints are humongous. The will to learn is there but the process is slow and time consuming.
Sir is pretty good, but amount of computational required is high.... So you need to ask for access from Mechanical Department

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Ballistic testing of metal foam composites

review: It is difficult to perform experimental work from home hence have to do the theoretical aspects as of now. The project is 80% practical though.

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Deep Learning for Time Series Classification
review: Good so far. Expects work every week but helpful

projectReviews.ProjectTitle: Large area pressure sensor for smart floor sensor applications
review: Not currently doing this. But finished it up almost a year ago

profReviews.ProjectTitle: Kalman Filter applications in Microgrids for state estimation and stability issues
review: Going well so far. Really responsive and helpful prof.

Really nice prof , has alot of knowledge in this domain. Though it would've been better if I could do this offline. Replies promptly and answers all my questions. The work is very interesting too . No complaints, would definitely recommend if you're interested in his work.
Ma'am will be very busy. You will work with the PhD scholars most of the time
Great prof to do project under.
